Overview

Administrators can allow Interviewers to directly sign up with a company ID before an Interview, without having to log in (if the interviewer's account is not created already). HackerRank allows you to do this with the Self-Sign Up for Interviewers feature present in the Settings > Interview Settings page of HackerRank.

To enable the Self-Sign Up for Interviewers feature:

  1. Click Settings on the profile icon at the top of the page.
  2. Click Interview Settings.
  3. The Self-Sign Up for Interviewers feature is enabled by default. Therefore, Interviewers will be prompted to sign up before starting an Interview.
  4. Clear the option to disable the feature. This allows the Interviewer to log in to an Interview without having to sign up.
